original: Dhāretīti dhammo. Ayañhi yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne apāyadukkhe, saṃsāradukkhe

original: ca apatamāne dhāretīti, tannibbattakakilesaviddhaṃsanañcettha dhāraṇaṃ. Evañca katvā
analyzed: ca a patamāne dhāreti iti tad nibbattaka kilesa viddhaṃsanam ca ittha dhāraṇam evam ca katvā

original: ariyamaggo, tassa tadatthasiddhihetutāya nibbānañcāti ubhayameva nippariyāyato dhāreti.
analyzed: ariya maggaḥ tassa tad attha siddhi hetutāya nibbānam ca ati ubhayam eva nippariyāyataḥ dhārā iti

original: Ariyaphalañca pana taṃsamucchinnakilesapaṭippassambhanena tadanukūlatāya, pariyattidhammo
analyzed: ariya phalam ca pana tad samucchinna kilesa paṭippassambhanena tad anukūla tāya pariyatti dhammaḥ

original: ca tadadhigamahetutāyāti ubhayampi pariyāyato dhāretīti veditabbaṃ, taṃ dhammaṃ.
analyzed: ca tad adhigama hetu tāya ati ubhayam pi pariyāyataḥ dhāreti iti veditabbam tam dhammam

original: Ca-saddo samuccayattho. Tena yathāvuttaṃ buddhaṃ, imañca dhammaṃ vanditvāti buddharatanena
analyzed: ca saddo samuccaya ttho tena yathā vuttam buddham iman ca dhammam vanditvā iti buddha ratanena

original: saha vandanakiriyāya dhammaratanaṃ samuccinoti.
analyzed: saha vandana kiriyāya dhamma ratanam samuccinoti

original: Na kevalaṃ idaṃ dvayamevāti āha “saṅghañcā”ti. Ariyena diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhato
analyzed: na kevalam idam dvayam eva ati āha saṅgham ca ati ariyena diṭṭhi sīla sāmaññena saṃhataḥ

original: ghaṭitoti saṅgho, aṭṭhaariyapuggalasamūho. Tehi tehi vā maggaphalehi kilesadarathānaṃ
analyzed: ghaṭitaḥ ti saṅghaḥ aṭṭha ariya puggala samūho tehi tehi vā magga phalehi

original: samucchedapaṭippassambhanavasena sammadeva ghātitattā saṅgho, pothujjanikasaṅghassāpi
analyzed: samuccheda paṭippassambhana vasena sammat eva ghātita ttā saṅgho pothujjanika saṅghassa api

original: pubbabhāgappaṭipadāya ṭhitattā purimacetanāya viya dāne ettheva saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: pubbabhāga ppaṭipadāya ṭhita ttā purima cetanāya viya dāne ettha iva saṅgahaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Sopi hi kiñcāpi ariyena diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena asaṃhato, niyyānikapakkhiyena pana pothujjanikena
analyzed: saḥ api hi kiñcā api ariyena diṭṭhi sīla sāmaññena asaṃhataḥ niyyānika pakkhiyena pana pothujjanikena

original: saṃhatattā dakkhiṇeyyapaṇipātāraho saṅghoyevāti, taṃ saṅghaṃ. Ca-saddassattho etthāpi
analyzed: saṃhata ttā dakkhiṇeyya paṇipāta ārahaḥ saṅghaḥ yeva ati tam saṅgham ettha api

original: vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
analyzed: vutta nayena iva veditabbaḥ

original: Kiṃvisiṭṭhaṃ buddhaṃ, dhammaṃ, saṅghañcāti āha “vandanāmānapūjāsakkārabhājana”nti.
analyzed: kiṃvisiṭṭham buddham dhammam saṅgham ca ati āha vandanā māna pūjā sakkāra bhājanam ti

original: Idañca visesanaṃ paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ “vandanāmānapūjāsakkārabhājanaṃ. Buddhaṃ…pe…
analyzed: idam ca visesanam paccekam yojetabbam vandanā māna pūjā sakkāra bhājanam buddhaṃ pe

original: vandanāmānapūjāsakkārabhājanaṃ saṅghañcā”ti. Tattha sadevakena lokena arahatādīhi
analyzed: vandanā māna pūjā sakkāra bhājanam saṅgham ca ati tattha sa devakena lokena arahat ādīhi

original: guṇehi seṭṭhabhāvena kariyamāno paṇāmo vandanā, sammāno māno, gandhapupphādīhi upahāro
analyzed: guṇehi seṭṭha bhāvena kariyamānaḥ paṇāmaḥ vandanā sammānaḥ mānaḥ gandha puppha ādīhi upahāro

original: pūjā, abhisaṅkhatapaccayadānaṃ sakkāro, vandanā ca māno ca pūjā ca sakkāro ca vandanāmānapūjāsakkārā,
analyzed: pūjā abhisaṅkhata paccaya dānam sakkāraḥ vandanā ca māno ca pūjā ca sakkāro ca vandanā māna pūjā sakkārā

original: tesaṃ mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena bhājanattā ādhārattā vandanāmānapūjāsakkārabhājanaṃ.
analyzed: tesam mahat phala bhāva karaṇena bhājana ttā ādhāra ttā vandanā māna pūjā sakkāra bhājanam

original: Iminā ratanattayassa arahatādīhi guṇehi asamabhāvaṃ dasseti. Tandassanampi takkatassa
analyzed: iminā arahata ādīhi guṇehi asama bhāvam dasseti tad dassanam pi takkatassa

original: nipaccakārassa sasantānapavanādivasena yathādhippetāya atthasaṃvaṇṇanāya nipphādanasamatthabhāvadīpanatthanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: nipacca kārassa sa santāna pavana ādi vasena yathā adhippetāya attha saṃvaṇṇanāya nipphādana samattha bhāva dīpana attham ti veditabbam

original: Vippasannena cetasā vanditvāti arahatādianekappakāraguṇavisesānussaraṇavasena vividhena,
analyzed: vippasannena cetasā vanditvā iti arahata ādi aneka ppakāra guṇa visesa anussaraṇa vasena vividhena

original: visesena vā pasannena manasā saddhiṃ kāyavācāhi karaṇabhūtāhi abhivandiyāti attho,
analyzed: visesena vā pasannena manasā saddhim kāya vācāhi karaṇa bhūtāhi abhivandiya ati attho

original: tīhi dvārehi namassitvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tividhā cāyaṃ vandanā kāyavacīmanovandanānaṃ
analyzed: tīhi dvārehi namassitvā iti vuttam hoti tividhā ca ayam vandanā kāya vacī manaḥ vandanānam

original: vasena. Tattha buddhādiguṇārammaṇā kāmāvacarakusalakiriyānaṃ aññataracetanā kāyavacīviññattiyo
analyzed: vasena tattha buddha ādi guṇa ārammaṇā kāmāvacara kusala kiriyānam aññatara cetanā kāya vacī viññattiyo

original: samuṭṭhāpetvā kāyavacīdvāravasena uppannā kāyavacīvandanāti vuccati, ubhayaviññattiyo
analyzed: samuṭṭhāpetvā kāya vacī dvāra vasena uppannā kāya vacīvandanā ati vuccati ubhaya viññattiyo

original: pana asamuṭṭhāpetvā manodvāravasena uppannā manovandanāti. Imassa padassa “vaṇṇanaṃ
analyzed: pana a samuṭṭhāpetvā manaḥ dvāra vasena uppannā manovandanā ti imassa padassa vaṇṇanaṃ

original: vaṇṇayissāmī”ti iminā sambandho.
analyzed: vaṇṇayissāmi iti iminā sambandhaḥ

original: Evaṃ ratanattayassa paṇāmaṃ dassetvā idāni attano nissayabhūtānaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyānañca
analyzed: evam ratanattayassa paṇāmam dassetvā idāni attanaḥ nissaya bhūtānam aṭṭhakathā cariyānam ca

original: paṇāmaṃ dassento “theravaṃsappadīpāna”ntiādimāha. Tattha katañjalī pubbācariyasīhānaṃ
analyzed: paṇāmam dassento thera vaṃsa ppadīpānaṃ ti ādim āha tattha katañjalī

original: namo katvāti sambandho. Kato añjali karapuṭo etenāti katañjalī. Chandānurakkhaṇatthañhettha
analyzed: namaḥ katvā iti sambandhaḥ kataḥ añjali kara puṭaḥ etena ati katañjalī chanda anurakkhaṇa attham ha ittha

original: dīgho, katañjalī hutvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Pubbācariyā porāṇaṭṭhakathākārā tambapaṇṇiyā
analyzed: dīghaḥ katañjalī hutvā iti vuttam hoti pubba ācariyāḥ porāṇa aṭṭhakathākārāḥ tambapaṇṇiyā

original: mahātherā, te eva parissayasahanato, paṭipakkhabhūtakilesahananato, paravādimigehi
analyzed: mahā therā te eva parissaya sahanato paṭipakkha bhūta kilesa hananato para vādi migehi

original: apadhaṃsanīyato ca sīhasadisattā sīhāti pubbācariyasīhā, tesaṃ pubbācariyasīhānaṃ.
analyzed: apadhaṃsanīyato ca sīha sadisa ttā sīha ati pubba ācariya sīhā tesam pubba ācariya sīhānam

original: Kīdisā te pubbācariyasīhā, yesaṃ tayā namo karīyatīti āha “theravaṃsappadīpāna”ntiādi.
analyzed: kīdisā te pubba ācariya sīhā yesam tayā namaḥ karīyati iti āha thera vaṃsa ppadīpa ananti ādi

original: Tattha theravaṃsappadīpānanti thirehi sīlakkhandhādīhi samannāgatāti therā, mahākassapādayo,
analyzed: tattha thera vaṃsa ppadīpānam ti thirehi sīla kkhandha ādīhi samannāgatā ati therāḥ mahākassapa ādayo

original: tesaṃ vaṃso anvayoti theravaṃso. Etena bhinnaladdhikānaṃ sattarasabhedānaṃ mahāsaṅghikādīnaṃ
analyzed: tesam vaṃsaḥ thera vaṃsaḥ etena bhinna laddhikānam satta rasa bhedānam mahāsaṅghika ādīnam

original: vaṃsaṃ paṭikkhipati, theravaṃsapariyāpannā hutvā pana āgamādhigamasampannattā paññāpajjotena
analyzed: vaṃsam paṭikkhipati thera vaṃsa pariyāpannā hutvā pana āgama adhigama sampanna ttā paññāpajjotena

original: tassa theravaṃsassa dīpanato theravaṃsappadīpā, pubbācariyasīhā, tesaṃ theravaṃsappadīpānaṃ.
analyzed: tassa thera vaṃsassa dīpanataḥ thera vaṃsa padīpā pubba ācariya sīhā tesam thera vaṃsa padīpānam

original: Asaṃhīrattā thirānaṃ. Vinayakkameti ārambhānurūpavacanametaṃ, te pana suttābhidhammesupi thirā eva.
analyzed: vinaya kkamā iti ārambha anurūpa vacanam etam te pana sutta abhidhammesu pi thirāḥ eva

original: Evaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyānampi paṇāmaṃ dassetvā idāni saṃvaṇṇetabbadhammavisesassa abhidhānānisaṃsaṃ,
analyzed: evam aṭṭhakathā cariyānam pi paṇāmam dassetvā idāni saṃvaṇṇetabba dhamma visesassa abhidhāna anisaṃsam

original: desakasampattiyo ca dassento “pāmokkha”ntiādimāha. Tattha mahesinā yaṃ pātimokkhaṃ
analyzed: desaka sampattiyaḥ ca dassento pāmokkha nti ādim āha tattha mahesinā yam pātimokkham

original: pakāsitanti sambandho. Tattha mahesināti mahante sīlādike pañca dhammakkhandhe esī
analyzed: pakāsitam ti sambandhaḥ tattha mahesinā ati mahante sīla ādike pañca dhammakkhandhe esī

original: gavesīti mahesi. Mahantehi esitoti vā puthujjanasekhāsekhaisīhi visiṭṭhattā mahanto
analyzed: gavesīti mahesi mahantehi esito ti vā puthujjana sekhā sekha esīhi visiṭṭha ttā mahanto

original: isīti vā mahesi, sammāsambuddho, tena mahesinā. Pātimokkhanti sattāpattikkhandhasaṃvarabhūtaṃ
analyzed: isi iti vā mahesi sammāsambuddhaḥ tena mahesinā satta āpatti kkhandha saṃvara bhūtam

original: sikkhāpadasīlaṃ, taddīpanato ubhatovibhaṅgasuttasaṅkhātaṃ ganthapātimokkhameva vā.
analyzed: sikkhāpada sīlam tad dīpanataḥ ubhatas vibhaṅga sutta saṅkhātam gantha pātimokkham eva vā

original: Kimbhūtanti āha “pāmokkha”ntiādi. Pamukhe sādhūti pamokkhaṃ, pamokkhameva pāmokkhaṃ,
analyzed: kimbhūtanti āha pāmokkha ntiādi pamukhe sādhu iti pamokkham pamokkham eva pāmokkham

original: vajjapaṭipakkhattā anavajjānaṃ samādhipaññāsaṅkhātānaṃ parittamahaggatalokuttarānaṃ
analyzed: vajja paṭipakkha ttā anavajjānam samādhi paññā saṅkhātānam paritta mahaggata lokuttarānam

original: kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ādi patiṭṭhābhūtanti attho. “Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṃ
analyzed: kusalānam dhammānam ādi patiṭṭhā bhūtanti attho sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sa pañño cittam

original: paññañca bhāvaya”nti hi vuttaṃ. Mukhamivāti mukhaṃ, dvāraṃ. Yathā hi sattānaṃ khajjabhojjaleyyapeyyavasena
analyzed: paññam ca bhāvayanti hi vuttam mukham iva ati mukham dvāram yathā hi sattānam khajja bhojja leyya peyya vasena

original: catubbidhopi āhāro mukhena pavisitvā aṅgapaccaṅgāni pharati, evaṃ yoginopi cātubhūmakakusalaṃ
analyzed: catubbidhaḥ api āhāraḥ mukhena pavisitvā aṅga paccaṅgāni pharati evam yoginaḥ api cātubhūmaka kusalam

original: sīlamukhena pavisitvā atthasiddhiṃ sampādeti. Tena vuttaṃ “mukhamivāti mukha”nti.
analyzed: sīla mukhena pavisitvā attha siddhim sampādeti tena vuttam mukham iva ati mukhanti

original: Atha vā mukhaṃ dvāraṃ mokkhappavesāya nibbānasacchikiriyāyāti attho. Vuttañhi –
analyzed: atha vā mukham dvāram mokkha ppavesāya nibbāna sacchikiriyāya ati atthaḥ vuttam hi

original: “Avippaṭisāratthāni kho, ānanda, kusalāni sīlānī”ti.
analyzed: a vippaṭisāra tthāni kho ānanda kusalāni sīlāni iti

original: Tathā –
analyzed: tathā

original: “Avippaṭisāro pāmojjatthāya, pāmojjaṃ pītatthāya, pīti passaddhatthāya, passaddhi
analyzed: a vippaṭisāraḥ pāmojja atthāya pāmojjam pīta tthāya pīti passaddha tthāya passaddhi

original: nibbidatthāya, nibbidā virāgatthāya, virāgo vimuttatthāya, vimutti vimuttiñāṇadassanatthāya,
analyzed: nibbida tthāya nibbidā virāga tthāya virāgaḥ vimutta tthāya vimutti vimutti ñāṇa dassana tthāya

original: vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ anupādāparinibbānatthāyā”ti ca.
analyzed: vimutti ñāṇa dassanam anupādā parinibbāna tthāya ati ca

original: Evaṃ saṃvaṇṇetabbadhammassa abhidhānādiṃ dassetvā idāni saṃvaṇṇanāya nimittaṃ dassetuṃ
analyzed: evam saṃvaṇṇetabba dhammassa abhidhāna ādim dassetvā idāni saṃvaṇṇanāya nimittam dassetum

original: “sūratenā”tiādinā catutthagāthamāha. Tattha sūratenāti sobhane ratoti sūrato u-kārassa
analyzed: sūratena ati ādinā catuttha gātham āha tattha sūratena ati sobhane rato ti sūrataḥ ukārassa

original: dīghaṃ katvā, tena sūratena, sobhane kāyikavācasikakamme ratenāti attho, vinītenāti
analyzed: dīgham katvā tena sūratena sobhane kāyika vācasika kamme ratena ati atthaḥ vinītena ati

original: vuttaṃ hoti. Nivātenāti nīcavuttinā. Sucisallekhavuttināti sucibhūtā kilesasallikhanasamatthā

original: vutti paṭipatti etassāti sucisallekhavutti, tena sucisallekhavuttinā, parisuddhāya
analyzed: vutti paṭipatti etassa ati suci sallekha vutti tena suci sallekha vuttinā parisuddhāya

original: appicchavuttiyā samannāgatenāti attho. Vinayācārayuttenāti vārittacārittasīlasampannena.
analyzed: appiccha vuttiyā samannāgatena ati atthaḥ vinaya ācāra yuttena ati vāritta cāritta sīla sampannena

original: Atha vā vinayoti cettha pātimokkhasaṃvarādibhedo saṃvaravinayo. Ācāroti ācāragocaraniddese
analyzed: atha vā vinayo ti ca ittha pātimokkha saṃvara ādi bhedo saṃvara vinayo ācāro ti ācāra gocara niddese

original: āgatasamaṇasāruppācāro. Soṇattherenāti ettha soṇoti tassa nāmaṃ. Thirehi sīlakkhandhādīhi

original: samannāgatattā thero. Yācitoti abhiyācito. Thero hi pātimokkhassa gambhīratāya duravagāhataṃ,
analyzed: theraḥ yācitaḥ ti abhiyācitaḥ theraḥ hi pātimokkhassa gambhīra tāya

original: ācariyassa ca taṃsaṃvaṇṇanāya sāmatthiyaṃ ñatvā “pātimokkhassa tayā atthasaṃvaṇṇanā
analyzed: ācariyassa ca tad saṃvaṇṇanāya sāmatthiyam ñatvā pātimokkhassa tayā attha saṃvaṇṇanā

original: kātabbā. Evañhi sāsanassa suciraṭṭhitikatā hotī”ti sānisaṃsagāravena yācanaṃ akāsi.
analyzed: kātabbā evam hi sāsanassa su cira ṭṭhitika tā hoti iti sa anisaṃsa gāravena yācanam akāsi

original: Tadassa yācanaṃ attano saṃvaṇṇanāya nidānabhūtaṃ dassento “yācito”ti āha.
analyzed: tat assa yācanam attano saṃvaṇṇanāya nidāna bhūtam dassentaḥ yācitā iti āha

original: Ettha ca “sūratenā”ti imināssa soraccaṃ vuccati. “Nivātenā”ti iminā nīcamanatā nivātavuttitā,
analyzed: ettha ca sūratena ati iminā assa soraccam vuccati nivātena ati iminā nīca mana tā nivāta vutti tā

original: yāya nivātavuttitāya samannāgato puggalo nihatamāno, nihatadappo, pādapuñchanacoḷakasamo,
analyzed: yāya nivāta vutti tāya samannāgataḥ puggalaḥ nihata mānaḥ nihata dappaḥ pāda puñchana coḷaka samaḥ

original: bhinnavisāṇūsabhasamo, uddhaṭadāṭhasappasamo ca hutvā saṇho sakhilo sukhasambhāso
analyzed: bhinna visāṇūsabha samaḥ uddhaṭa dāṭha sappa samaḥ ca hutvā saṇhaḥ sa khilaḥ sukha sambhāsaḥ

original: hoti. “Sucisallekhavuttinā”ti iminā indriyasaṃvarapaccayasannissitaājīvapārisuddhisīlaṃ.
analyzed: hoti suci sallekha vuttinā ti iminā indriya saṃvara paccaya sannissita ājīva pārisuddhi sīlam

original: “Vinayācārayuttenā”ti iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Evamanekaguṇehi

analyzed: tassa abhitthavanam yathāvutta guṇa samannāgatassa sabrahmacārino ajjhesanam na sakkā

original: paṭibāhitunti paramagambhīrassāpi pātimokkhassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ pavattāti dassanatthaṃ.
analyzed: paṭibāhitum ti parama gambhīrassa api pātimokkhassa attha saṃvaṇṇanā ayam pavattā ati dassana ttham

original: Kiñca – tādisassa ajjhesanaṃ nissāya kariyamānā atthasaṃvaṇṇanā tassa ajjhesanādhipaccena,
analyzed: kiñca tādisassa ajjhesanam nissāya kariyamānā attha saṃvaṇṇanā tassa ajjhesana ādhipaccena

original: mamañca ussāhasampattiyā na cirena pariyosānaṃ gacchatīti katanti veditabbaṃ.

original: Evaṃ saṃvaṇṇanāya nimittaṃ dassetvā idāni tassavane sotujanassādaraṃ janetuṃ tappayojanakaraṇappakāranissayābhidhānādiṃ

original: dassento “tatthā”tiādigāthādvayamāha. Tattha tatthāti “yaṃ mahesinā pātimokkhaṃ pakāsita”nti

analyzed: hoti evam bandhitabbā sā heṭṭhima paricchedena sace ekavīsati bhikkhū gaṇhāti vaṭṭati

analyzed: na mahā sīmāya ṭhitehi khaṇḍa sīmā khaṇḍa sīmā ayam eva pana ṭhatvā khaṇḍa sīmā bandhitabbā

original: mahāsīmāyameva ṭhatvā mahāsīmā.
analyzed: mahā sīmā ayam eva mahā sīmā

analyzed: tatra ayam bandhana vidhi evam nimittāni

analyzed: kamma vācāya sīmā sammannitabbā atha tassāḥ eva daḷhī kammattham a vippavāsa kamma vācā

original: kātabbā. Evañhi “sīmaṃ samūhanissāmā”ti āgatā samūhanituṃ na sakkhissanti. Sīmaṃ
analyzed: kātabbāḥ evam hi sīmam samūhanissāma ati āgatāḥ samūhanitum na sakkhissanti sīmam

analyzed: avippavāsa sīmā sammannane kate sati sā ca avippavāsasīmā nāma hoti tena āha

analyzed: agāmake araññā iti viñjhāṭa visadise araññe tena āha agāmakam nāma atiādi ayam pana

original: pañhe pucchi. So te byākāsi. Bhagavā tassa sādhukāraṃ datvā “kativasso tvaṃ, sopākā”ti
analyzed: pañhe pucchi saḥ te bhagavā tassa sādhukāram da tvā kati vassaḥ tvam

original: pucchi. Sattavassohaṃ bhagavāti. “Sopāka, tvaṃ mama sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā
analyzed: pucchi sattavassā uham bhagavā iti sopāka tvam mama sabbaññu ta ññāṇena saddhim saṃsanditvā

original: pañhe byākāsī”ti āraddhacitto upasampadaṃ anujāni, ayaṃ pañhābyākaraṇūpasampadā.
analyzed: pañhe āraddha cittaḥ upasampadam anujāni ayam pañha abyākaraṇa upasampadā

original: Aṭṭhagarudhammapaṭiggahaṇūpasampadā nāma mahāpajāpatiyā aṭṭhagarudhammappaṭiggahaṇena anuññātaupasampadā.
analyzed: aṭṭhagaru dhamma paṭiggahaṇa upasampadā nāma mahāpajāpatiyā aṭṭhagaru dhamma paṭiggahaṇena anuññāta upasampadā

original: Dūtenūpasampadā nāma aḍḍhakāsiyā gaṇikāya anuññātaupasampadā.
analyzed: dūtenūpasampadā nāma aḍḍhakāsiyā gaṇikāya anuññāta aupasampadā

original: Aṭṭhavācikūpasampadā nāma bhikkhuniyā bhikkhunisaṅghato ñatticatutthena, bhikkhusaṅghato ñatticatutthenāti imehi dvīhi kammehi upasampadā.
analyzed: aṭṭhavācikūpasampadā nāma bhikkhuniyā bhikkhuni saṅghataḥ ñatti catutthena bhikkhu saṅghataḥ ñatti catutthena ati imehi dvīhi kammehi upasampadā

original: Ñatticatutthakammūpasampadā nāma bhikkhūnaṃ etarahi upasampadā. Ñatticatutthenāti
analyzed: ñatti catuttha kamma upasampadā nāma bhikkhūnam etarahi upasampadā ñatti catutthena ati

original: tīhi anussāvanāhi, ekāya ca ñattiyāti evaṃ ñatticatutthena. Kiñcāpi hi ñatti sabbapaṭhamaṃ
analyzed: tīhi anussāvanāhi ekāya ca ñattiyā ati evam ñatti catutthena kiñcā api hi ñatti sabba paṭhamam

original: vuccati, tissannaṃ pana anussāvanānaṃ atthabyañjanabhedābhāvato atthabyañjanabhinnaṃ
analyzed: vuccati tissannam pana anussāvanānam attha byañjana bheda abhāvataḥ attha byañjana bhinnam

original: ñattiṃ tāsaṃ catutthanti katvā “ñatticatuttha”nti vuccati. Akuppenāti akopetabbataṃ,
analyzed: ñattim tāsam catutthanti katvā ñatti catutthanti vuccati akuppena ati a kopetabba tam

original: appaṭikkositabbatañca upagatena. Ṭhānārahenāti kāraṇārahena satthu sāsanārahena.
analyzed: a paṭikkositabba tañca upagatena ṭhāna ārahena ati kāraṇa ārahena satthu sāsana ārahena

original: Upasampanno nāma uparibhāvaṃ samāpanno, pattoti attho. Bhikkhubhāvo hi uparibhāvo,
analyzed: upasampannaḥ nāma upari bhāvam samāpannaḥ patto ti attho bhikkhu bhāvaḥ hi upari bhāvaḥ

original: tañcesa yathāvuttena kammena samāpannattā “upasampanno”ti vuccati. Kasmā panettha
analyzed: tat ca isa yathā vuttena kammena samāpanna ttā upasampannaḥ ti vuccati kasmā pana ittha

original: imināva upasampanno idha gahito, nāññehīti? Vuccate – ehibhikkhūpasampadā antimabhavikānameva,
analyzed: iminā āva upasampannaḥ idha gahitaḥ na aññehi iti vuccate ehi bhikkhu upasampadā antimabhavikānam eva

original: saraṇagamanūpasampadā parisuddhānaṃ, ovādappaṭiggahaṇapañhābyākaraṇūpasampadā mahākassapasopākānaṃ,
analyzed: saraṇa gamana upasampadā parisuddhānam ovāda paṭiggahaṇa pañha abyākaraṇa upasampadā mahākassapa sopākānam

original: na ca te bhabbā pārājikādilokavajjaṃ āpajjituṃ, aṭṭhagarudhammappaṭiggahaṇādayo ca
analyzed: na ca te bhabbā pārājika ādi loka vajjam āpajjitum aṭṭha garu dhamma paṭiggahaṇa ādayo ca

original: bhikkhunīnaṃyeva anuññātā. Ayañca bhikkhu, tasmā ñatticatuttheneva upasampadākammena
analyzed: bhikkhunīnam yeva anuññātā ayam ca bhikkhu tasmai ñatti catutthena iva upasampadā kammena

original: upasampanno idha gahito, nāññehīti veditabbo. Paṇṇattivajjesu pana sikkhāpadesu aññepi
analyzed: upasampannaḥ idha gahitaḥ na aññehi iti veditabbo paṇṇatti vajjesu pana sikkhāpadesu aññe pi

original: ehibhikkhūpasampadāya upasampannādayo saṅgayhanti. Vakkhati hi “paṇṇattivajjesu pana
analyzed: ehi bhikkhu upasampadāya upasampanna ādayaḥ saṅgayhanti vakkhati hi paṇṇatti vajjesu pana

original: aññepi saṅgahaṃ gacchantī”ti. Idāni “akuppena ṭhānārahena upasampanno”ti saṃkhittena
analyzed: aññe api saṅgaham gacchanti iti idāni akuppena ṭhāna arahena upasampannaḥ ti saṃkhittena

original: vuttamatthaṃ vitthāretvā dassetuṃ “tassa panā”tiādimāha.
analyzed: vutta mattham vitthāretvā dassetum tassa pana ati ādim āha

original: Tatthāti tesu pañcasu. Vasati etthāti vatthu, ādhāro patiṭṭhā. Tenāha “upasampadāpekkho
analyzed: tattha iti tesu pañcasu vasati ettha iti vatthu ādhāraḥ patiṭṭhā tena āha upasampada apekkhaḥ

original: puggalo”ti. Ūnāni aparipuṇṇāni vīsati vassāni assāti ūnavīsativasso. Ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ,
analyzed: puggalaḥ ti ūnāni aparipuṇṇāni vīsati vassāni assa ati ūnavīsati vassaḥ ettha yam vattabbam

original: taṃ upari sappāṇakavagge ūnavīsatisikkhāpade vaṇṇayissāma. Tesūti paṇḍakādīsu ekādasasu
analyzed: tam upari sappāṇaka vagge ūnavīsati sikkhāpade vaṇṇayissāma tesu iti paṇḍaka ādīsu ekādasasu

original: abhabbapuggalesu. Paṇḍako panettha pañcavidho hoti āsittapaṇḍako, usūyapaṇḍako, opakkamikapaṇḍako,
analyzed: abhabba puggalesu paṇḍako pana ittha pañcavidhaḥ hoti āsitta paṇḍako usūya paṇḍako opakkamika paṇḍako

original: napuṃsakapaṇḍako, pakkhapaṇḍakoti. Tesu āsittapaṇḍakassa ca usūyapaṇḍakassa ca pabbajjā
analyzed: napuṃsaka paṇḍako pakkha paṇḍako ti tesu āsitta paṇḍakassa ca usūya paṇḍakassa ca pabbajjā

original: na vāritā, itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vāritā. Tesupi pakkhapaṇḍakassa yasmiṃ pakkhe paṇḍako
analyzed: na vāritā itaresam tiṇṇam vāritā tesu pi pakkhapaṇḍakassa yasmin pakkhe paṇḍako

original: hoti, tasmiṃyevassa pakkhe pabbajjā vāritāti. Tayo cettha pabbajjūpasampadānaṃ abhabbatāya
analyzed: hoti tasmin yeva assa pakkhe pabbajjā vāritā ati tayo ca ittha pabbajjūpasampadānam a bhabba tāya

original: avatthū. Tenāha “āsittapaṇḍakañcā”tiādi. Tattha yassa paresaṃ aṅgajātaṃ mukhena gahetvā
analyzed: avatthū tena āha tattha yassa paresam aṅga jātam mukhena gahetvā

original: asucinā āsittassa pariḷāho vūpasammati, ayaṃ āsittapaṇḍako. Yassa paresaṃ ajjhācāraṃ
analyzed: asucinā āsittassa pariḷāhaḥ ayam āsitta paṇḍakaḥ yassa paresam ajjhācāram

original: passato usūyāya uppannāya pariḷāho vūpasammati, ayaṃ usūyapaṇḍako. Yassa upakkamena
analyzed: passataḥ usūyāya uppannāya pariḷāhaḥ vūpasammati ayam usūya paṇḍakaḥ yassa upakkamena

original: bījāni apanītāni, ayaṃ opakkamikapaṇḍako. Yo pana paṭisandhiyaṃyeva abhāvako uppanno,
analyzed: bījāni apanītāni ayam opakkamika paṇḍakaḥ yaḥ pana paṭisandhiyam yeva abhāvakaḥ uppanno

original: ayaṃ napuṃsakapaṇḍako. Ekacco pana akusalavipākānubhāvena kāḷapakkhe paṇḍako hoti,
analyzed: ayam napuṃsaka paṇḍakaḥ ekaccaḥ pana akusala vipāka anubhāvena kāḷapakkhe paṇḍakaḥ hoti

original: juṇhapakkhe panassa pariḷāho vūpasammati, ayaṃ pakkhapaṇḍakoti veditabbo.
analyzed: juṇha pakkhe panassa pariḷāhaḥ ayam pakkhapaṇḍakaḥ ti veditabbo

original: Theyyena saṃvāso etassāti theyyasaṃvāsako. So ca na saṃvāsamattasseva thenako idhādhippeto,
analyzed: theyyena saṃvāsaḥ etassa ati theyyasaṃvāsako so ca na saṃvāsa mattassa iva thenakaḥ idha adhippeto

original: atha kho liṅgassa, tadubhayassa ca thenakopīti āha “theyyasaṃvāsako pana tividho”tiādi.
analyzed: atha kho liṅgassa tad ubhayassa ca thenakopī iti āha theyyasaṃvāsakaḥ pana tividhaḥ utiādi

original: Na bhikkhuvassāni gaṇetīti “ahaṃ dasavasso vā vīsativasso vā”ti musā vatvā bhikkhuvassāni
analyzed: na bhikkhu vassāni gaṇeti iti aham dasa vassaḥ vā vīsati vassaḥ vā ati musā vatvā bhikkhu vassāni

original: na gaṇeti. Na yathāvuḍḍhaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vā sāmaṇerānaṃ vā vandanaṃ sādiyatīti attanā
analyzed: na gaṇeti na yathāvuḍḍham bhikkhūnam vā sāmaṇerānam vā vandanam sādiyati iti attanā

original: musāvādaṃ katvā dassitavassānurūpena yathāvuḍḍhaṃ vandanaṃ nādhivāseti. Na āsanena
analyzed: musāvādam katvā dassita vassa anurūpena yathāvuḍḍham vandanam na adhivāseti na āsanena

original: paṭibāhatīti “apehi, me etaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti āsanena nappaṭibāhati. Na uposathādīsu sandissatīti
analyzed: paṭibāhati iti apehi me etam pāpuṇāti iti āsanena na paṭibāhati na uposatha ādīsu sandissati iti

original: uposathappavāraṇādīsu na sandissati. Liṅgamattassevāti evasaddena saṃvāsaṃ nivatteti.
analyzed: uposatha pavāraṇa ādīsu na sandissati liṅga mattassa iva āti eva saddena saṃvāsam nivatteti

original: Samānoti santo. Liṅgānurūpassa saṃvāsassāti sāmaṇeraliṅgānurūpassa sāmaṇerasaṃvāsassa.
analyzed: samānaḥ ti santaḥ liṅga anurūpassa saṃvāsassa ati sāmaṇera liṅga anurūpassa sāmaṇera saṃvāsassa

original: Sace pana kāsāye dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā naggo vā odātavatthanivattho vā methunasevanādīhi
analyzed: sace pana kāsāye dhuram nikkhipitvā naggaḥ vā odāta vattha nivatthaḥ vā methuna sevana ādīhi

original: assamaṇo hutvā kāsāyāni nivāseti, liṅgatthenako hoti. Sace gihibhāvaṃ patthayamāno
analyzed: assamaṇaḥ hutvā kāsāyāni nivāseti liṅgatthenakaḥ hoti sace gihi bhāvam patthayamānaḥ

original: kāsāyaṃ ovaṭṭikaṃ katvā, aññena vā ākārena gihinivāsanena nivāseti “sobhati nu kho
analyzed: kāsāyam ovaṭṭikam katvā aññena vā ākārena gihi nivāsanena nivāseti sobhati nu kho

original: me gihiliṅgaṃ, na sobhatī”ti vīmaṃsanatthaṃ, rakkhati tāva, “sobhatī”ti sampaṭicchitvā
analyzed: me gihi liṅgam na sobhati iti vīmaṃsana attham rakkhati tāva sobhati iti sampaṭicchitvā

original: puna liṅgaṃ sādiyati, liṅgatthenako hoti. Odātaṃ nivāsetvā vīmaṃsanasampaṭicchanesupi
analyzed: punar liṅgam sādiyati odātam nivāsetvā vīmaṃsana sampaṭicchanesu pi

original: eseva nayo. Sacepi nivatthakāsāvassa upari odātaṃ nivāsetvā vīmaṃsati vā sampaṭicchati vā, rakkhati eva.
analyzed: esa iva nayo sace pi nivattha kāsāvassa upari odātam nivāsetvā vīmaṃsati vā sampaṭicchati vā rakkhati eva

original: Antimavatthuajjhāpannakepi eseva nayoti pārājikaṃ āpannake bhikkhumhipi eseva nayoti
analyzed: antima vatthu ajjhāpannake pi esā iva nayo ti pārājikam āpannake bhikkhumhi pi esā iva nayo ti

original: attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – sace koci bhikkhu kāsāye saussāhova odātaṃ nivāsetvā methunaṃ
analyzed: attho idam vuttam hoti sace koci bhikkhu kāsāye odātam nivāsetvā methunam

original: paṭisevitvā puna kāsāyāni nivāsetvā vassagaṇanādibhedaṃ sabbaṃ vidhiṃ āpajjati, ayaṃ
analyzed: paṭisevitvā puna kāsāyāni nivāsetvā vassa gaṇanā ādi bhedam sabbam vidhim āpajjati ayam

original: bhikkhūhi dinnaliṅgassa apariccattattā na liṅgatthenako, liṅgānurūpassa saṃvāsassa
analyzed: bhikkhūhi dinna liṅgassa a pariccatta ttā na liṅga tthenakaḥ liṅga anurūpassa saṃvāsassa

original: sāditattā nāpi saṃvāsatthenakoti. Videsanti paradesaṃ. Idañca vañcetuṃ sakkuṇeyyaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: sādita ttā para desam idam ca vañcetum sakkuṇeyya ṭṭhānaṃ

original: dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Yo pana sadesepi evaṃ karoti, sopi saṃvāsatthenakova. “Saṃvāsamattassevā”ti
analyzed: dassetum vuttam yaḥ pana sadese pi evam karoti saḥ api saṃvāsatthenakaḥ uva saṃvāsa mattassa iva āti

original: iminā liṅgaṃ paṭikkhipati. Sace koci vuḍḍhapabbajito bhikkhuvassāni gaṇetvā mahāpeḷādīsu
analyzed: iminā liṅgam paṭikkhipati sace koci vuḍḍha pabbajitaḥ bhikkhu vassāni gaṇetvā mahāpeḷa ādīsu

original: diyyamānabhattaṃ gaṇhāti, sopi theyyasaṃvāsako hoti. Sayaṃ sāmaṇerova sāmaṇerappaṭipāṭiyā
analyzed: diyyamāna bhattam gaṇhāti saḥ api theyya saṃvāsakaḥ hoti sayam sāmaṇeraḥ uva sāmaṇera paṭipāṭiyā

original: kūṭavassāni gaṇetvā gaṇhanto theyyasaṃvāsako na hoti. Bhikkhu pana bhikkhupaṭipāṭiyā
analyzed: kūṭavassāni gaṇetvā gaṇhantaḥ theyyasaṃvāsakaḥ na hoti bhikkhu pana bhikkhu paṭipāṭiyā

original: kūṭavassāni gaṇetvā gaṇhanto bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbo.
analyzed: kūṭavassāni gaṇetvā gaṇhantaḥ bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbaḥ

original: Nanu saṃvāso nāma ekakammaṃ ekuddeso samasikkhatāti āha “bhikkhuvassagaṇanādiko hī”tiādi.
analyzed: nanu saṃvāsaḥ nāma eka kammam eka uddesaḥ samasikkhata iti āha bhikkhu vassa gaṇanā ādikaḥ hi itiādi

original: Iminā na kevalaṃ ekakammādikova kiriyabhedo saṃvāsoti idhādhippeto, atha kho tadañño
analyzed: iminā na kevalam eka kamma ādikaḥ u va kiriya bhedaḥ saṃvāso ti idha adhippetaḥ atha kho tad añño

original: bhikkhuvassagaṇanādikopīti dasseti. Imasmiṃ attheti theyyasaṃvāsakādhikāre. Sikkhaṃ
analyzed: bhikkhu vassa gaṇanā ādikaḥ api iti dasseti imasmin atthe ti theyya saṃvāsaka adhikāre sikkham

original: paccakkhāyāti sikkhaṃ pariccajitvā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – sace koci bhikkhu sikkhaṃ
analyzed: paccakkhāya ati sikkham pariccajitvā idam vuttam hoti sace koci bhikkhu sikkham

original: paccakkhāya liṅgaṃ anapanetvā dussīlakammaṃ katvā vā akatvā vā “na maṃ koci jānātī”ti
analyzed: paccakkhāya liṅgam an apanetvā dussīla kammam katvā vā a katvā vā na mama koci jānāti iti

original: puna sabbaṃ pubbe vuttaṃ vassagaṇanādibhedaṃ vidhiṃ paṭipajjati, so theyyasaṃvāsako hotīti.
analyzed: puna sabbam pubbe vuttam vassa gaṇanā ādi bhedam vidhim paṭipajjati so theyya saṃvāsakaḥ hoti iti

original: Sace pana kassaci rājā kuddho hoti, so “evaṃ me sotthi bhavissatī”ti sayameva liṅgaṃ
analyzed: sace pana kassaci rājā kuddhaḥ hoti saḥ evam me sotthi bhavissati iti sayam eva liṅgam

original: gahetvā palāyati. Taṃ disvā rañño ārocenti. Rājā “sace pabbajito, na taṃ labbhā kiñci
analyzed: gahetvā palāyati tam disvā raññaḥ ārocenti rājā sace pabbajitaḥ na tam labbhā kiñci

original: kātu”nti tasmiṃ kodhaṃ paṭivineti. So “vūpasantaṃ me rājabhaya”nti saṅghamajjhaṃ
analyzed: tasmin kodham paṭivineti saḥ me saṅgha majjham

original: anosaritvāva gihiliṅgaṃ gahetvā āgato pabbājetabbo. Athāpi “sāsanaṃ nissāya mayā
analyzed: anosaritvā ava gihi liṅgam gahetvā āgataḥ pabbājetabbaḥ atha api sāsanam nissāya mayā

original: jīvitaṃ laddhaṃ, handa dāni ahaṃ pabbajāmī”ti uppannasaṃvego teneva liṅgena āgantvā
analyzed: jīvitam laddham handa dāni aham pabbajāmi iti uppanna saṃvegaḥ tena iva liṅgena āgantvā

original: āgantukavattaṃ na sādiyati, bhikkhūhi puṭṭho vā apuṭṭho vā yathābhūtamattānaṃ āvikatvāva
analyzed: āgantuka vattam na sādiyati bhikkhūhi puṭṭhaḥ vā a puṭṭhaḥ vā yathābhūtam attānam

original: pabbajjaṃ yācati, liṅgaṃ apanetvā pabbājetabbo. Sace pana vattaṃ sādiyati, pabbajitālayaṃ
analyzed: pabbajjam yācati liṅgam apanetvā pabbājetabbaḥ sace pana vattam sādiyati pabbajita ālayam

original: dasseti, sabbaṃ pubbe vuttaṃ vassagaṇanādibhedaṃ paṭipajjati, ayaṃ pana na pabbājetabbo.
analyzed: dasseti sabbam pubbe vuttam vassa gaṇanā ādi bhedam paṭipajjati ayam pana na pabbājetabbaḥ

original: Idha panekacco dubbhikkhe jīvituṃ asakkonto sayameva liṅgaṃ gahetvā sabbapāsaṇḍiyabhattāni
analyzed: idha pana ekaccaḥ dubbhikkhe jīvitum a sakkontaḥ sayam eva liṅgam gahetvā sabba pāsaṇḍiya bhattāni

original: bhuñjanto dubbhikkhe vītivatte saṅghamajjhaṃ anosaritvāva gihiliṅgaṃ gahetvā āgatoti
analyzed: bhuñjantaḥ dubbhikkhe vītivatte saṅgha majjham anosaritvā ava gihi liṅgam gahetvā āgataḥ ti

original: sabbaṃ purimasadisameva.
analyzed: sabbam purima sadisam eva

original: Aparo mahākantāraṃ nittharitukāmo hoti, satthavāho ca pabbajite gahetvā gacchati.
analyzed: aparaḥ mahā kantāram nittharitu kāmaḥ hoti satthavāhaḥ ca pabbajite gahetvā gacchati

original: So “evaṃ maṃ satthavāho gahetvā gamissatī”ti sayameva liṅgaṃ gahetvā satthavāhena
analyzed: saḥ evam mam satthavāhaḥ gahetvā gamissati iti sayam eva liṅgam gahetvā satthavāhena

original: saddhiṃ kantāraṃ nittharitvā khemantaṃ patvā saṅghamajjhaṃ anosaritvāva gihiliṅgaṃ
analyzed: saddhim kantāram nittharitvā khemantam patvā saṅgha majjham anosaritvā ava gihi liṅgam

original: gahetvā āgatoti sabbaṃ purimasadisameva.
analyzed: gahetvā āgataḥ ti sabbam purima sadisam eva

original: Aparo rogabhaye uppanne jīvituṃ asakkonto sayameva liṅgaṃ gahetvā sabbapāsaṇḍiyabhattāni
analyzed: aparaḥ roga bhaye uppanne jīvitum a sakkontaḥ sayam eva liṅgam gahetvā sabba pāsaṇḍiya bhattāni

analyzed: sā api hi virati ādīnam dīpanato sikkhāpadanti vuccati vuttam pi ca itam sikkhāpadanti

original: yo tattha nāmakāyo padakāyo niruttikāyo byañjanakāyo”ti. Tatthāti tesu. Sikkhaṃ paripūrentoti

original: Ummattakakhittacittavedanāṭṭānanti ettha ummattakoti pittummattako. Khittacittoti

original: “Manodvāre āpatti nāma natthī”ti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ upanikkhittasādiyanādīsu
analyzed: manaḥ dvāre āpatti nāma natthi iti idam yebhuyya vasena vuttam upanikkhitta sādiyana ādīsu

original: āpattisambhavatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: āpatti sambhavato ti daṭṭhabbam

original: Akusalacitto vā āpajjatīti pārājikasukkavisaṭṭhikāyasaṃsaggaduṭṭhullaattakāmapāricariyaduṭṭhadosasaṅghabhedappahāradānatalasattikādibhedaṃ
analyzed: akusala cittaḥ vā āpajjati iti pārājika sukka visaṭṭhi kāya saṃsagga duṭṭhulla atta kāma pāricariya duṭṭha dosa saṅgha bheda ppahāra dāna talasattika ādi bhedam

original: āpattiṃ akusalacitto āpajjati. Anupasampannaṃ padasodhammaṃ vācento, mātugāmassa
analyzed: āpattim akusala cittaḥ āpajjati an upasampannam padaso dhammam vācentaḥ mātugāmassa

original: dhammaṃ desentoti evarūpaṃ āpattiṃ kusalacitto āpajjati. Asañciccasahaseyyādiṃ abyākatacitto
analyzed: dhammam desento ti evarūpam āpattim kusala cittaḥ āpajjati asañciccasahaseyya ādim abyākata cittaḥ

original: āpajjati. Yaṃ arahā āpajjati, sabbaṃ abyākatacittova āpajjati. Tenāha “kusalābyākatacitto vā”ti.
analyzed: āpajjati yam arahā āpajjati sabbam abyākata cittaḥ u āpajjati tena āha kusala abyākata cittaḥ vā ati

original: Dukkhavedanāsamaṅgī vāti duṭṭhadosādibhedaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjanto dukkhavedanāsamaṅgī
analyzed: dukkha vedanā samaṅgī vā ati duṭṭha dosa ādi bhedam āpattim āpajjantaḥ dukkha vedanā samaṅgī

original: āpajjati. Methunadhammādibhedaṃ pana sukhavedanāsamaṅgī āpajjati. Yaṃ sukhavedanāsamaṅgī
analyzed: āpajjati methuna dhamma ādi bhedam pana sukha vedanā samaṅgī āpajjati yam sukha vedanā samaṅgī

original: āpajjati, taṃyeva majjhatto hutvā āpajjanto adukkhamasukhavedanāsamaṅgī āpajjati.
analyzed: āpajjati taṃ yeva majjhattaḥ hutvā āpajjantaḥ adukkham asukha vedanā samaṅgī āpajjati

original: Tenāha “itaravedanādvayasamaṅgī vā”ti. Idampi ca tikadvayaṃ yebhuyyavaseneva vuttaṃ.
analyzed: tena āha itara vedanā dvaya samaṅgī vāti idam pi ca tika dvayam yebhuyya vasena iva vuttam

original: Nipajjitvā nirodhasamāpanno hi acittako avedano sahaseyyāpattiṃ āpajjatīti. Kiñcāpi
analyzed: nipajjitvā nirodha samāpannaḥ hi acittakaḥ avedano sahaseyya āpattim āpajjati iti kiñca api

original: evaṃ aniyamena vuttaṃ, viseso panettha atthīti dassetuṃ “evaṃ santepī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: evam aniyamena vuttam visesaḥ pana ittha atthi iti dassetum evam sante pi itiādi vuttam

original: Evaṃ santepīti hi visesābhidhānanimittābhyūpagameva yujjati. Sabbesaṃ vasena tīṇi

original: Idāni taṃ yathāvuttanidānādivedanāttikapariyosānaṃ sattarasappakāraṃ imasmiṃ sikkhāpade
analyzed: idāni tam yathā vutta nidāna ādi vedanā attika pariyosānam satta rasa ppakāram imasmim sikkhāpade

analyzed: yojetum idha pana ati ādim āha idha ati imasmin paṭhama pārājika sikkhāpade vesāliyanti

original: evaṃnāmake itthiliṅgavasena pavattavohāre nagare. Tañhi nagaraṃ tikkhattuṃ pākāraparikkhepavaḍḍhanena
analyzed: evaṃnāmake itthi liṅga vasena pavatta vohāre nagare tat hi nagaram tikkhattum pākāra parikkhepa vaḍḍhanena

original: visālībhūtattā “vesālī”ti vuccati. Idampi ca nagaraṃ sabbaññutaṃ sampatteyeva sammāsambuddhe
analyzed: visālībhūta ttā vesālī iti vuccati idam pi ca nagaram sabbaññu tam sampatteya iva sammāsambuddhe

original: sabbākāravepullattaṃ pattanti veditabbaṃ. “Sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāyā”ti ca “antamaso tiracchānagatāyapī”ti
analyzed: sabba ākāra vepullattam pattanti veditabbam sikkham a paccakkhāya ati ca antamasaḥ tiracchāna gatāya api iti

original: ca dve anupaññattiyoti makkaṭivajjiputtakavatthūnaṃ vasena vuttā. “Antamaso tiracchānagatāyā”ti
analyzed: ca dve anupaññattiyaḥ ti makkaṭi vajjiputtaka vatthūnam vasena vuttāḥ antamasaḥ tiracchāna gatāya iti

original: visuṃyevāpattikarā ca hoti. Aññavādakasikkhāpadādīsu viyāti aññavādakasikkhāpadādīsu
analyzed: visuṃyeva āpatti karā ca hoti aññavādaka sikkhāpada ādīsu viyāti aññavādaka sikkhāpada ādīsu

original: visuṃyeva vihesakādīsupi pācittiyaṃ hoti. Yathāha “ropite vihesake saṅghamajjhe vatthusmiṃ
analyzed: visuṃyeva vihesaka ādīsu pi pācittiyam hoti yathā āha ropite vihesake saṅgha majjhe vatthusmiṃ

original: vā āpattiyā vā anayuñjiyamāno taṃ nakathetukāmo taṃ naugghāṭetukāmo tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṃ
analyzed: vā āpattiyā vā an a yuñjiyamānaḥ tam na kathetu kāmaḥ tam na ugghāṭetu kāmaḥ tuṇhībhūtaḥ saṅgham

original: viheseti, āpatti pācittiyassā”tiādi. Supinante vijjamānāpi mocanassādacetanā abbohārikattā
analyzed: viheseti āpatti pācittiyassa atiādi supin ante vijjamānā api

original: anāpattikarāti āha “aññatra supinantātiādikā viyā”ti. Tathā hi thinamiddhena abhibhūtattā

analyzed: supine cittam abbohārikam cittassa abbohārika ttā opakkamana kiriyā pavattanikā api cetanā

original: abbohārikā. Vuttañhetaṃ “atthesā, bhikkhave, cetanā, sā ca kho abbohārikā”ti, tasmā
analyzed: abbohārikā vuttam ha etam attha isā bhikkhave cetanā sā ca kho abbohārikā ati tasmā

analyzed: aññatra ayam anupaññatti anāpatti karāḥ jātāḥ ādi saddena aññatra

analyzed: saṅgaṇhāti adinnādāna ādīsu viyā ati adinnādāna ādīsu araññā vāti ādikā viyā ti attho

analyzed: imassa pana chinnā iti iminā sambandhaḥ taca ādīni anavasesetvā ati nimitta ppadese bahi

analyzed: pana abbhantare chavi cammassa ca vijjamāna ttā vuttam camma khilanti camma khaṇḍam

original: “Uṇṇigaṇḍo”tipi vadanti. Tañhi nimitte jātattā nimittameva. Tenāha “sevanacitte sati
analyzed: vadanti tat hi nimitte jāta ttā nimittam eva tena āha sevana citte sati

original: pārājika”nti. Sevanacitteti methunasevanacitte. Kāyasaṃsaggasevanacitte pana sati
analyzed: pārājikam ti sevana citta iti methuna sevana citte kāya saṃsagga sevana citte pana sati

analyzed: vā ti atthaḥ mate akkhāyite yebhuyyena akkhāyite ca pārājika āpatti vacanato pana naṭṭha kāya ppasāde pi

analyzed: itthi nimitte pavesentassa pārājika āpattiyā iva nimitta saṇṭhāna mattam pi an avasesetvā ati

analyzed: pavesetvā dutiyena nīharantassa thullaccayam vuttam vuttam hi samantapāsādikāyam

analyzed: imassa sattassa anuloma vasena sabbattha vaṇa saṅkhepe thullaccayam veditabbanti

original: Manussānaṃ pana akkhiādayopi vaṇasaṅgahaṃ gacchantīti vaṇena ekaparicchedaṃ katvā

original: Kuthiteti uddhumātakabhāvappatte. Īdise hi sarīre yattha katthaci upakkamato dukkaṭaṃ.
analyzed: kuthita iti uddhumātaka bhāva ppatte īdise hi sarīre yattha katthaci upakkamataḥ dukkaṭam

original: Yopi danto bahi nikkhamanto tiṭṭhati, na sakkā oṭṭhehi pidahituṃ, tatthāpi eseva nayo.

original: Vedanāya aṭṭo pīḷito vedanāṭṭo. Ummattakoti cettha pittummattako adhippetoti āha

original: Evaṃ imāni tulayitvā pañca ṭhānāni dhāreyya atthaṃ vicakkhaṇo āpattiṃ vā anāpattiṃ vā garukaṃ vā lahukaṃ vā āpattiṃ yathāṭhāne ṭhapeyyāti.

original: Evaṃ tattha vinicchayaṃ dassetvā idāni anāpattiṃ dassento “sakasaññissā”tiādimāha.

original: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa vissāsaṃ gahetuṃ, sandiṭṭho ca hoti, sambhatto ca ālapito ca jīvati ca jānāti ca ‘gahite me attamano”’ti.

original: tasmiṃ pāṇe pāṇasaññino kāyavacīdvārānaṃ aññataradvārappavattāya yāya cetanāya. Manodvāre
analyzed: tasmin pāṇe pāṇa saññinaḥ kāya vacī dvārānaṃ aññatara dvāra ppavattāya yāya cetanāya manaḥ dvāre

original: pana pavattāya vadhakacetanāya pāṇātipātabhāvo natthi. Sā cetanāti sā jīvitindriyupacchedakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā
analyzed: pana pavattāya vadhaka cetanāya pāṇātipāta bhāvaḥ natthi sā cetanā ati sā jīvitindriya upacchedaka aupakkama samuṭṭhāpikā

original: kāyavacīdvārānaṃ aññataradvārappavattā vadhakacetanā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yāya cetanāya
analyzed: kāya vacī dvārānaṃ aññatara dvāra ppavattā vadhaka cetanā idam vuttam hoti yāya cetanāya

original: pavattamānassa jīvitindriyassa nissayabhūtesu mahābhūtesu upakkamakaraṇahetu taṃmahābhūtapaccayā
analyzed: pavattamānassa jīvitindriyassa nissaya bhūtesu mahābhūtesu upakkama karaṇa hetu tad mahābhūta paccayā

original: uppajjanakamahābhūtā nuppajjissanti, sā tādisapayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā pāṇātipāto.
analyzed: uppajjanaka mahābhūtāḥ na uppajjissanti sā tādisa payoga samuṭṭhāpikā cetanā pāṇātipātaḥ

original: Laddhūpakkamāni hi mahābhūtāni itarabhūtāni viya na visadānīti samānajātikānaṃ kāraṇaṃ na hontīti.
analyzed: laddhūpakkamāni hi mahābhūtāni itara bhūtāni na visadāni iti samāna jātikānam kāraṇam na honti iti

original: Pāṇātipāto assa atthīti pāṇātipātī. Saṃsagge ayamīkāro. Tenāha “vuttacetanāya samaṅgipuggalo”ti.
analyzed: pāṇa atipātaḥ assa atthi iti pāṇa atipātī saṃsagge ayamīkāro tena āha vutta cetanāya samaṅgi puggalo ti

original: Sako hattho sahattho, tena nibbatto payogo sāhatthiko. Nissajjanaṃ nissaggo, sova
analyzed: sakaḥ hatthaḥ sahatthaḥ tena nibbattaḥ payogaḥ sāhatthikaḥ nissajjanam nissaggaḥ saḥ uva

original: nissaggiyo. Evaṃ āṇattiko. Vijjāmayo mantaparijappanayogo. Iddhimayo kammavipākajiddhimayo.
analyzed: nissaggiyaḥ evam āṇattikaḥ vijjā mayaḥ manta parijappana yogaḥ iddhi mayaḥ kamma vipāka jiddhi mayaḥ

original: Idāni yathāvutteyeva cha payoge vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
analyzed: idāni payoge vibhajitvā dassetum tattha atiādi vuttam tattha

original: tatthāti tesu chasu payogesu. Sāhatthikoti ettha hattho upalakkhaṇabhāvena gahitoti
analyzed: tattha ati tesu chasu payogesu sāhatthiko ti ettha hatthaḥ upalakkhaṇa bhāvena gahito ti

original: āha “kāyena vā”tiādi. Tattha kāyenāti hatthena vā pādena vā muṭṭhinā vā jāṇunā vā
analyzed: āha kāyena vā atiādi tattha kāyena ati hatthena vā pādena vā muṭṭhinā vā jāṇunā vā

original: yena kenaci aṅgapaccaṅgena. Kāyekadeso hettha hatthādikāyo avayave samudāyopacāro
analyzed: yena kenaci aṅga paccaṅgena kāya ikadesaḥ hettha hattha ādi kāyaḥ avayave samudāya upacāraḥ

original: yathā “gāmo daḍḍho”ti. Kāyappaṭibaddhenāti kāyato amocitena asiādinā paharaṇena.
analyzed: yathā gāmaḥ daḍḍho ti kāya ppaṭibaddhena ati kāyataḥ a mocitena asi ādinā paharaṇena

original: Paharaṇanti kāyaviññattisahitāya vadhakacetanāya adhippetatthasādhanaṃ. Kāyena vā
analyzed: paharaṇam ti kāya viññatti sahitāya vadhaka cetanāya adhippeta ttha sādhanam kāyena vā

original: sattiādīnaṃ, kāyappaṭibaddhena vā usuyantapāsāṇādīnaṃ nissajjananti yathāsambhavaṃ
analyzed: satti ādīnam kāya paṭibaddhena vā usu yanta pāsāṇa ādīnam nissajjananti yathāsambhavam

original: yojetabbaṃ. Tatthāti tesu sāhatthikanissaggiyesu. Uddissānuddissabhedatoti uddisitvā
analyzed: yojetabbam tattha ati tesu sāhatthika nissaggiyesu uddissa anuddissa bhedataḥ ti uddisitvā

original: ca anuddisitvā ca pavattibhedena. Uddisanaṃ uddiso, so etassa atthīti uddisako, payogo,
analyzed: ca an uddisitvā ca pavatti bhedena uddisanam uddiso saḥ etassa atthi iti uddisakaḥ payogo

original: tasmiṃ. Bajjhati etenāti baddho, kammameva baddho kammabaddho, pāṇātipātoti attho.
analyzed: tasmin bajjhati etena ati baddhaḥ kammam eva baddhaḥ kamma baddhaḥ pāṇātipāto ti attho

original: Atha vā bandhanaṃ baddho, kammunā baddho kammabaddho, so assa hoti, pāṇātipātakammamassa
analyzed: atha vā bandhanam baddhaḥ kammunā baddhaḥ kamma baddhaḥ saḥ assa hoti pāṇa atipāta kammam assa

original: siddhanti vuttaṃ hoti. Ubhayatthāpīti uddisake, anuddisake cāti dvīsupi. Pacchā vā
analyzed: siddham ti vuttam hoti ubhayattha api iti uddisake anuddisake ca ati dvīsu pi pacchā vā

original: teneva rogena maratūti yojanā. Paharitakkhaṇeyevāti maraṇāya pahonakappahārassa laddhakkhaṇeyeva
analyzed: tena iva rogena maratu uti yojanā maraṇāya pahonaka pahārassa laddha kkhaṇā iva

original: kammabaddho. Yadi avassaṃ tena maratīti adhippāyo. Sace pana maraṇādhippāyena pahāraṃ
analyzed: kamma baddhaḥ yadi a vassam tena marati iti adhippāyaḥ sace pana maraṇa adhippāyena pahāram

original: datvā tena amatassa puna aññena cittena pahāre dinne pacchāpi paṭhamappahāreneva
analyzed: da tvā tena amatassa puna aññena cittena pahāre dinne pacchā api paṭhama ppahārena iva

original: marati, tadāva kammabaddho. Atha dutiyapahārena marati, natthi pāṇātipāto. Ubhayehi
analyzed: marati tadā ava kamma baddhaḥ atha dutiya pahārena marati natthi pāṇātipāto ubhayehi

original: matepi paṭhamappahāreneva kammabaddho, ubhayehipi amate nevatti pāṇātipāto. Esa nayo
analyzed: mate pi paṭhama pahārena iva kamma baddhaḥ ubhayehi pi amate na iva tti pāṇātipāto esa nayo

original: bahūhipi ekassa pahāre dinne. Tatrāpi hi yassa pahārena marati, tasseva kammabaddhoti.
analyzed: ekassa pahāre dinne tatra api hi yassa pahārena marati tassa iva kamma baddhaḥ ti

original: Āṇāpanaṃ nāma vacīviññattisahitāya vadhakacetanāya adhippetatthasādhanaṃ.
analyzed: āṇāpanam nāma vacī viññatti sahitāya vadhaka cetanāya adhippeta ttha sādhanam

original: Idāni imasmiṃ āṇattikapayoge saṅketavisaṅketabhāvajānanatthaṃ chabbidhaṃ niyamaṃ
analyzed: idāni imasmin āṇattika payoge saṅketa visaṅketa bhāva jānana ttham chabbidham niyamam

original: dassento “tatthā”tiādimāha. Tattha tatthāti tasmiṃ āṇattikapayoge. Āṇattiniyāmakāti
analyzed: dassentaḥ tattha ati ādim āha tattha tattha iti tasmin āṇattika payoge āṇatti niyāmakā ati

original: āṇattikapayogasādhikā. Etesu hi avirajjhitesuyeva āṇattikapayogo hoti, na aññathāti.
analyzed: āṇattika payoga sādhikā etesu hi a virajjhitesu yeva āṇattika payogaḥ hoti na aññathā ati

original: Puggaloti māretabbo puggalo. Tenāha “yaṃ hī”tiādi. Āṇāpakassa āpattīti āṇāpakassa
analyzed: puggalo ti māretabbo puggalo tena āha yam hi itiādi āṇāpakassa āpatti iti āṇāpakassa

original: āṇattikkhaṇe āpatti, āṇattassa māraṇakkhaṇe. Āṇāpako muccatīti āṇattasseva kammabaddho,
analyzed: āṇatti kkhaṇe āpatti āṇattassa māraṇa kkhaṇe āṇāpakaḥ muccati iti āṇattassa iva kamma baddho

original: vatthuvisesena panettha kammaviseso ca āpattiviseso ca hotīti. “Purebhattaṃ mārehī”ti
analyzed: vatthu visesena pana ittha kamma viseso ca āpatti viseso ca hoti iti purebhattam mārehi iti

original: āṇatto purebhattameva māretīti “ajja sve”ti aniyametvā “purebhattaṃ mārehī”ti āṇatto
analyzed: āṇattaḥ purebhattam eva māreti iti ajja sva iti aniyametvā purebhattam mārehi iti āṇattaḥ

original: yadā kadāci purebhattaṃ māreti. Yo pana “ajja pubbaṇhe”ti vutto majjhanhe vā sāyanhe
analyzed: yadā kadāci purebhattam māreti yaḥ pana ajja pubbaṇhā iti vuttaḥ majjhanhe vā sāyanhe

original: vā sve vā pubbaṇhe māreti, visaṅketo hoti, āṇāpakassa natthi kammabaddho. Pubbaṇhe
analyzed: vā sve vā pubbaṇhe māreti visaṅketaḥ hoti āṇāpakassa na atthi kamma baddhaḥ pubbaṇhe

original: māretuṃ vāyamantassa majjhanhe jātepi eseva nayo. Etena nayena sabbakālappabhedesu
analyzed: māretum vā āyamantassa majjhanhe jāte pi esa iva nayaḥ etena nayena sabba kāla ppabhedesu

original: saṅketavisaṅketatā veditabbā.
analyzed: saṅketa visaṅketa tā veditabbā

original: Evaṃ vatthukālesu saṅketavisaṅketataṃ dassetvā idāni okāsādīsu saṅketavisaṅketataṃ
analyzed: evam vatthu kālesu saṅketa visaṅketa tam dassetvā idāni okāsa ādīsu saṅketa visaṅketa tam

original: atidisanto “iminā nayenā”tiādimāha. Tattha okāsoti gāmo vā vanaṃ vā gehadvāraṃ vāti
analyzed: atidisantaḥ iminā nayena atiādim āha tattha okāsaḥ ti gāmaḥ vā vanam vā geha dvāram vā ati

original: evamādiko. Āvudhanti asi vā usu vā satti vāti evamādi. Iriyāpathoti māretabbassa
analyzed: evamādikaḥ asi vā usu vā satti vā ati evamādi iriyāpathaḥ ti māretabbassa

original: gamanaṃ vā nisajjā vāti evamādi. Kiriyāvisesoti vijjhanaṃ vā chedanaṃ vā bhedanaṃ
analyzed: gamanam vā nisajjā vā ati evamādi kiriyā viseso ti vijjhanam vā chedanam vā bhedanam

original: vā saṅkhamuṇḍakaṃ vāti evamādi. Imesu yathā yathā vadhako āṇatto, tathā tathā kate
analyzed: vā saṅkha muṇḍakam vāti evamādi imesu yathā yathā vadhakaḥ āṇattaḥ tathā tathā kate

original: āṇāpakassa āpatti, aññathā kate visaṅketo hoti. Tenāha “iminā nayenā”tiādi. Tattha
analyzed: āṇāpakassa āpatti aññathā kate visaṅketaḥ hoti tena āha iminā nayena atiādi tattha

original: sabbatthāti okāsādīsu catūsu. Hoti cettha –
analyzed: sabbattha ati okāsa ādīsu catūsu hoti ca ittha

original: “Yathāṇattivaseneva, āṇattena kate sati;
analyzed: yathā āṇatti vasena iva āṇattena kate sati

original: Āṇāpakassa āpatti, visaṅketoññathā kate”ti.
analyzed: āṇāpakassa āpatti visaṅketā uññathā katā iti

original: Āṇattiyaṃ pana ayaṃ viseso – adhiṭṭhāyāti adhiṭṭhahitvā āṇāpeti “evaṃ vijjha, evaṃ pahara, evaṃ ghātehī”ti vuttāya pāḷiyā labbhatīti ñātabbo.
analyzed: āṇattiyam pana ayam visesaḥ adhiṭṭhāya ati adhiṭṭhahitvā āṇāpeti evam vijjha evam pahara evam ghātehi iti vuttāya pāḷiyā labbhati iti ñātabbaḥ

original: Opatanti etthāti opāto, āvāṭo, tassa khaṇanaṃ opātakkhaṇanaṃ. Apassenasaṃvidhānanti
analyzed: opatanti ettha ati opātaḥ āvāṭo tassa khaṇanam opāta khaṇanam a passena saṃvidhānam

original: apassenassa saṃvidhānaṃ. Niccaparibhogo mañco vā pīṭhaṃ vā apassenaphalakaṃ vā divāṭṭhāne
analyzed: apassenassa saṃvidhānam nicca paribhogaḥ mañcaḥ vā pīṭham vā apassena phalakam vā divāṭṭhāne

original: nisīdantassa apassenakatthambho vā tatthajātakarukkho vā caṅkame apassāya tiṭṭhantassa
analyzed: nisīdantassa a passena katthambhaḥ vā tatthajātaka rukkhaḥ vā caṅkame a passāya tiṭṭhantassa

original: ālambanarukkho vā ālambanaphalakaṃ vā, sabbampetaṃ apassanīyaṭṭhena apassenaṃ nāma,
analyzed: ālambana rukkhaḥ vā ālambana phalakam vā sabbam petam apassanīya ṭṭhena apassenam nāma

original: tasmiṃ apassene yathā apassayantaṃ vijjhati vā chindati vā, tathā katvā vāsipharasusattiārakaṇṭakādīsu
analyzed: tasmin apassene yathā apassayantam vijjhati vā chindati vā tathā katvā vā asi phara susatti ārakaṇṭaka ādīsu

original: aññatarassa satthassa ṭhapananti attho.
analyzed: aññatarassa satthassa ṭhapananti attho

original: Upanikkhipanaṃ nāma samīpe nikkhipanaṃ. Manāpassa vā amanāpassa vā rūpassa upaharaṇaṃ
analyzed: upanikkhipanam nāma samīpe nikkhipanam manāpassa vā amanāpassa vā rūpassa upaharaṇam

original: samīpe ṭhapanaṃ rūpūpahāro, attanā vā yakkhapetādivesaṃ gahetvā tiṭṭhanaṃ. Ādisaddena
analyzed: samīpe ṭhapanam rūpa upahāraḥ attanā vā yakkha peta ādi vesam gahetvā tiṭṭhanam ādi saddena

original: saddūpahārādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Etthāpīti thāvarapayogepi. Uddissānuddissabhedo veditabbo,
analyzed: ettha api iti thāvara payoge pi uddissa anuddissa bhedaḥ veditabbo

original: yato tatthapi pubbe vuttanayeneva kammabaddho hoti. Ayaṃ pana viseso – mūlaṭṭhena
analyzed: yatas tattha api pubbe vutta nayena iva kamma baddhaḥ hoti ayam pana visesaḥ mūla ṭṭhena

original: opātādīsu paresaṃ mūlena vā mudhā vā dinnesupi yadi tappaccayā koci marati, mūlaṭṭhasseva
analyzed: opāta ādīsu paresam mūlena vā mudhā vā dinnesu pi yadi tad paccayā koci marati mūla ṭṭhassa iva

original: kammabaddho. Yadipi tena, aññena vā tatra opāte vināsetvā bhūmisame katepi paṃsuhārakā
analyzed: kamma baddhaḥ yadi api tena aññena vā tatra opāte bhūmi same kate api

original: vā paṃsuṃ gaṇhantā, mūlakhaṇakā vā mūlāni khaṇantā āvāṭaṃ karonti, deve vā vassante
analyzed: vā paṃsum gaṇhantāḥ mūlakhaṇakāḥ vā mūlāni khaṇantāḥ āvāṭam karonti deve vā vassante

original: kaddamo jāyati, tattha ca koci otaritvā vā laggitvā vā marati, mūlaṭṭhasseva kammabaddho.
analyzed: kaddamaḥ jāyati tattha ca koci otaritvā vā laggitvā vā marati mūlaṭṭhassa iva kamma baddhaḥ

original: Yadi pana yena laddhaṃ, so vā añño vā vitthatataraṃ vā gambhīrataraṃ vā karoti, tappaccayā
analyzed: yadi pana yena laddham saḥ vā aññaḥ vā vitthatataram vā gambhīrataram vā karoti tad paccayā

original: ca koci marati, ubhayesampi kammabaddho. Yathā tu mūlāni mūlehi saṃsandanti, tathā
analyzed: ca koci marati kamma baddhaḥ yathā tu mūlāni mūlehi saṃsandanti tathā

original: tattha thale kate muccati. Evaṃ apassenasaṃvidhānādīsupi yāva tesaṃ pavatti, tāva
analyzed: tattha thale kate muccati evam yāva tesam pavatti tāva

original: yathāsambhavaṃ kammabaddho veditabbo.
analyzed: yathāsambhavam kamma baddhaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: Vijjāparijappananti āthabbaṇikehi, vijjādharehi ca mantaparijappanaṃ. Kammavipākajāya
analyzed: vijjā parijappanam ti āthabbaṇikehi vijjādharehi ca manta parijappanam kamma vipāka jāya

original: iddhiyāti sātisayakammanibbattāya kammavipākena sahajātāya iddhiyā, kammassa vā vipākabhāvena
analyzed: iddhiyā ti sa atisaya kamma nibbattāya kamma vipākena sahajātāya iddhiyā kammassa vā vipāka bhāvena

original: jātāya iddhiyā. Payojananti pavattanaṃ, karaṇanti attho, dāṭhāvudhādīnaṃ dāṭhākoṭanādīnamiva
analyzed: jātāya iddhiyā payojanam nti pavattanam karaṇanti atthaḥ dāṭhāvudha ādīnam dāṭhā koṭana ādīnam iva

original: māraṇatthaṃ kammavipākajiddhivikārakaraṇanti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: māraṇa attham kamma vipāka jiddhi vikāra karaṇanti vuttam hoti

original: Kammasādhano vāyaṃ hārakasaddo bahulaṃvidhānena tatthāpi ṇvupaccayassa sijjhanatoti
analyzed: kamma sādhanaḥ vā ayam hāraka saddaḥ bahulam vidhānena tattha api ṇu u paccayassa sijjhanato ti

original: āha “atha vā”tiādi. Jīvitaharaṇakaṃ, upanikkhipitabbaṃ vā satthameva hārakanti vikappadvayena
analyzed: āha atha vā atiādi jīvita haraṇakam upanikkhipitabbam vā sattham eva hārakan ti vikappa dvayena

original: vuttanti āha “satthañca taṃ hārakañcāti satthahāraka”nti. “Hārakasattha”nti vattabbe
analyzed: vuttan ti āha sattham ca tam hārakam ca ati sattha hārakam ti hāraka sattham ti vattabbe

original: visesanassa paranipātaṃ katvā evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pariyeseyyāti gaveseyya.
analyzed: visesanassa para nipātam katvā evam vuttanti daṭṭhabbam pariyeseyya ati gaveseyya

original: “Yathā labhati, tathā kareyyā”ti iminā pana adhippāyatthamāha, “upanikkhipeyyā”ti
analyzed: yathā labhati tathā kareyya iti iminā pana adhippāya ttham āha upanikkhipeyya iti

original: iminā sikhāpattamatthaṃ. Itarathā hi “pariyeseyyā”ti imassa “upanikkhipeyyā”ti ayamattho
analyzed: iminā sikhāpattamattham itarathā hi pariyeseyya ati imassa upanikkhipeyya ati ayam atthaḥ

original: adhippeto na siyā. Pariyiṭṭhamatteyevāti pariyesitamatteyeva. Yadi evaṃ atha kasmā
analyzed: adhippetaḥ na siyā pariyiṭṭha mattā iya iva ati pariyesita mattā iya iva yadi evam atha kasmā

original: pāḷiyaṃ “satthahārakaṃ vāssa pariyeseyyāti asiṃ vā sattiṃ vā bheṇḍiṃ vā laguḷaṃ vā
analyzed: pāḷiyam sattha hārakam vā assa pariyeseyyāti asim vā sattim vā bheṇḍim vā laguḷam vā

original: pāsāṇaṃ vā satthaṃ vā visaṃ vā rajjuṃ vā”ti vuttanti āha “padabhājane panā”tiādi.
analyzed: pāsāṇam vā sattham vā visam vā rajjum vā ati vuttan ti āha pada bhājane pana atiādi

original: Assāti “satthahārakaṃ vāssa pariyeseyyā”ti imassa padassa. Byañjanānurūpato paripuṇṇaṃ
analyzed: assa ati sattha hārakam vā assa pariyeseyya iti imassa padassa byañjana anurūpato paripuṇṇam

original: katvā atthassa avuttattā “byañjanaṃ anādiyitvā”ti vuttaṃ. Sasati hiṃsatīti satthaṃ,
analyzed: katvā atthassa a vutta ttā byañjanam an ādiyitvā iti vuttam sasati hiṃsati iti sattham

original: sasanti hiṃsanti etenāti vā satthaṃ. Ādisaddena “sattiṃ vā”tiādipāḷisesaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
analyzed: sasanti hiṃsanti etena ati vā sattham ādi saddena sattim vā ati ādi pāḷisesam saṅgaṇhāti

original: Tattha laguḷanti muggaro. Satthanti vuttāvasesaṃ yaṃ kiñci samukhaṃ veditabbaṃ.

original: Itaresaṃ pañcannaṃ ubhayampi vāritaṃ. Te hi anantarāva narake nibbattanakasattā.

original: Sā hi ajjhācāravītikkamaṃ akatvāpi ettāvatā assamaṇī nāma hoti.

analyzed: ubhinnam rāga vasena sadisa bhāva upagatānam dhammo methuna dhammo ti vuccati tasmā

original: 1. Methunadhammasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
Abhilāpamattanti vacanamattaṃ, na atthoti adhippāyo. Liṅgabhedamattanti purisaliṅgaṃ

original: itthiliṅganti visesamattaṃ. Visesoti nānāttaṃ. Chandena cevāti pemena ceva, sinehena

original: cevāti attho. Ruciyā cāti icchāya ca. Padhaṃsitāyāti dūsitāya. Paripuṇṇā upasampadā

original: Methunadhammasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

original: Asādhāraṇapārājikaṃ
analyzed: asādhāraṇa pārājikam

original: 5. Ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
Ubbhakapparanti dutiyamahāsandhito uddhaṃ. Ito cito ca sañcaraṇanti hatthassa vā kāyassa vā tiriyaṃ ito cito ca sañcaraṇaṃ.

analyzed: ekatas avassutā iti ettha kiñcā api ekatas ti avisesena vuttam tathā api bhikkhuniyā eva avassute sati ayam āpatti bhedaḥ vuttaḥ iti veditabbaḥ ti
